main.name: Aiman Shakeel
main.description: Working as a Java Developer by Day, wannabe Full Stack Javascript Developer by Night
main.bio: My name is Aiman. I am a passionate developer/coder with a strong educational background in Computer Science & Engineering. Currently I am working as a developer in a top MNC of India. I have a work experience of more than 3 years in IT Industry. I have worked on multiple projects including a large scale web application based on Java and SQL. Apart from working on the associated organization's project, I am on a learning journey of Full Stack Javascript Development. As part of this journey, currently I am working on some of my own projects based on NodeJS, React, Firebase, MongoDb, webpack etc. As Data Science and Artificial Intelligenc also fascinates me, I would love to work on these technologies in near future.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: Currently I am working as a Fullstack Java Developer. This experience as a Java Developer has provided the proficient level skill of Java Ecosystem as well as it has given a great insight about the Software Development Lifecycle. Now I am looking for a career transition to Javascript development. As part of this transition I am learning React and NodeJS along with some other technologies of Javascript Ecosystem.
